message: I'm looking into setting up a "production" branch. How are people doing this with mercurial? What does your workflow look like as far as specific hg commands?

the admin here, Steve Losh, has written a bunch of excellent blog posts, start here: http://stevelosh.com/blog/2010/02/mercurial-workflows-branch-as-needed/ -- there's one post somewhere that addresses howto issues on branching between default and stable.
